name: Rooftop Postgirl
description:
Hello, this is a 2D platformer adventure game where you have to jump a lot. It has pixel-art graphics and a really complex story with many plot twists and good characters. The gameplay is similar to Paperboy and the old Mario games. It's also pretty funny, so if you like comedy I think you'll enjoy.
Well, I guess that's it. I hope you like my game.



The game contains:

  • Comedy. Funny situations.
  • A Sidescroller camera like the old 2D games.
  • Platformer obstacles that the player needs to jump over.
  • A crazy story full of plt twists.

Sound Effects are from: Freesound.org

Musics were made using LMMS.
